topic_or_construct: Emotional and behavioral problems in children
justification: The article discusses the use of the Child Behavior Checklist (CBCL) to assess emotional and behavioral problems in children. The text indicates that the CBCL is widely used and validated across various populations, including low-income families and children with developmental disabilities. The CBCL is mentioned specifically for assessing children aged 2-3 and 4-18.
